pages.text: There are many new gems to be found in Terramity.$(br2)Rubies, sapphires, topaz, onyx, and iridescent shards are new gems that can be combined to make many new items for you to play with.

Rubies can be found almost anywhere in the nether.$(br2)Sapphire can be found in snowy biomes.$(br2)Topaz can be found in hot, arid biomes.$(br2)Onyx can be found in the end.$(br2)Iridescent shards can be found deep anywhere in the overworld.
